-- https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/azure-docs/blob/master/articles/synapse-analytics/how-to-analyze-complex-schema.md
-- https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/develop-openrowset
-- https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/synapse-analytics/sql/query-json-files
-- https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/functions/openjson-transact-sql?view=azure-sqldw-latest
-- https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/sql/t-sql/functions/json-query-transact-sql?view=azure-sqldw-latest

USE master;
GO;
IF DB_ID('iot') IS NULL CREATE DATABASE iot;
GO;
USE iot;

IF OBJECT_ID('iotdata', 'V') IS NOT NULL DROP VIEW iotdata;
GO;

CREATE VIEW iotdata  
AS 
SELECT --TOP 100
    JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.sensorid') AS sensorid,
    CAST(JSON_VALUE (jsonContent, '$.praegid') AS INT) AS praegid,
    ts,
    DATEADD(ms, CAST(RIGHT(ts, 3) AS INT), DATEADD(s, ts/1000, CAST('1970-01-01' AS DATETIME2(3)))) AS dt,
    weg,
    kraft
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://mpajn6axh2pc3wispoc.dfs.core.windows.net/public/machine-data.json',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b',
        FIELDTERMINATOR ='0x0b',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'
    )
WITH (
    jsonContent varchar(MAX)
    ) AS [q]
CROSS APPLY openjson (JSON_QUERY (jsonContent, '$.series')) 
WITH (  ts BIGINT '$.ts',
        weg FLOAT '$.Weg',
        kraft INT '$.Kraft'
    );
